definition: to find out/to know/to learn about
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: She was thunderstruck to hear the news.
sentences.chinese: 得知消息時她大感驚訝。

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升爲經銷處副總經理，我心裏特別高興。

sentences.english: An internal member leaked information, so I got to know the truth.
sentences.chinese: 內部人員的露風，我得知了事情的真相。

sentences.english: Told that his mother was ill, Li Lei hurried home quickly.
sentences.chinese: 李蕾得知母親生病了時，馬上趕回了家。

sentences.english: Peng, learned about the one from the other end failure.
sentences.chinese: 蓬勒從電話那頭得知這次某殺失敗。

sentences.english: That's according to copies of search warrants released today.
sentences.chinese: 這是根據今天公佈的搜查證的副本文件所得知的。

sentences.english: Xu master know that very angry after the second day go to teach them.
sentences.chinese: 徐老爺得知後很生氣欲第二天去去教訓他們。

sentences.english: When he heard the news, he was quite freaked out.
sentences.chinese: 當他得知這一消息時，他真是急壞了。

sentences.english: Zhang Yimei learned that the eighth route army, the next step in meter.
sentences.chinese: 張怡梅得知八路軍的下一步計劃，計上心頭。

sentences.english: It was Michael, and I quickly learned he was always like that.
sentences.chinese: 這就是邁克爾，我很快就得知他一貫如此。

sentences.english: They heard this morning that they had passed the examination, so they went out to paint the town red.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午他們得知考試及格，於是都出去狂歡一場。

sentences.english: Yang Ming learned that the story of the blue Ling, he began to sympathize with the blue ling.
sentences.chinese: 楊明得知藍凌的身世，他開始同情起藍凌。

sentences.english: Tamson leaves when word reaches him of the prince's arrival.
sentences.chinese: 塔姆森在得知王子到來後就離開了。

sentences.english: It will take further testing to find out what kind of animal bones are in the broth.
sentences.chinese: 至於這是一碗什麼動物的湯還要進一步化驗纔會得知。

sentences.english: How can people know the contact information of each survey?
sentences.chinese: 巿民大衆如何得知每次民意調查的樣本資料？

sentences.english: From the results obtained, it is evident that the crystalline lens has birefringence.
sentences.chinese: 從實驗結果得知牛眼晶狀體具有雙折射的性能。

definition: to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
to press charges/to file a complaint
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
original/former/originally/formerly/at first/so, actually, as it turns out
